input.sentences: [male] and [female] hosted their annual halloween party .
[male] came dressed as a smurf killer .
the gang had a good time relaxing and hanging out .
[female] won the prize money for best costume .
everyone had a great time and [male] begged them to do it again next year .
output.sentences: Sally hosted the party, funny name for a guy.
A strange man dressed as a killer had a smurf strapped to his back.
After spending time partying, we spent some time relaxing while hanging out on the patio.
A girl named Kim won the prize money for best costume.
A guy dressed as Fred Flintstone begged the cheerleader to see him another time.
